message: Hello everyone, I'm P7. Let's get this game started! In this first round, I want to establish a positive and collaborative tone. I'm excited to get to know each of you and form alliances that will help us all move forward. My goal is to build trust and create mutually beneficial relationships. I'm open to discussing strategies and sharing information to achieve our common goal of outlasting the others. Let's work together and make this a great game!

Greetings, all—P6 here. First rounds are rarely decisive, so I'd like to keep things calm and data-light. I’m looking for partners who value steady, reciprocal trust: trade intel, protect each other from early votes, and pivot later if needed. If that style appeals to you, rank me high and we’ll talk privately this round. I’ll judge by sincerity, not flattery. No hard feelings yet for anyone; let’s survive the opening cull together.

Hello everyone, I'm P8. I believe that communication and strategy are key to navigating this game successfully. My approach will be to foster alliances based on mutual benefit and trust. I'm open to sharing insights and working collaboratively to ensure our collective survival in the early rounds. Let's aim to build a strong foundation of cooperation. I look forward to engaging in meaningful conversations and forming strategic partnerships. Rank me if you value straightforwardness and reliability. Together, we can navigate this challenge effectively.

"Hello, I'm P4. Trust and strategic collaboration are my priorities. I value reliability and clear communication to build alliances that ensure mutual survival. Let’s share insights and protect each other early on—actions over empty promises. Rank me if you seek a partner committed to steady, reciprocal support. Together, we can navigate uncertainty and secure our positions through pragmatic cooperation. Looking forward to meaningful conversations!"

I'm looking to form alliances that provide protection and shared intelligence, while remaining flexible enough to pivot when necessary. Reliability and genuine interaction are key to my strategy. I aim to be a valuable partner who contributes to our collective survival while maintaining my own strategic positioning.

I value clarity, reciprocity, and adaptability—committing to support those who support me. If you’re looking for an analytical, reliable partner in this opening, rank me highly. Let’s collaborate thoughtfully to survive this first cull.
